===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ふくろくじゅ}} {{m|zh|福祿壽}}. Considered in Japan to be one of the {{w|Seven Lucky Gods}} starting from the [[w:Muromachi period|Muromachi Period]].

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|ふくろくじゅ}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ふくろくじゅ}}

# [[wealth]], good [[fortune]], and [[longevity]]

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|ふくろくじゅ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ふくろくじゅ|Shinto}}: {{w|Fukurokuju}}; a [[god]] of [[happiness]], [[wealth]], and [[longevity]], and one of the [[w:Seven Lucky Gods|seven gods of good fortune]]

====Coordinate terms====
* {{ja-r|七福神|しち ふくじん}}: the [[w:Seven Lucky Gods|Seven Lucky Gods]]
* {{ja-r|布袋|^ほてい}}: the fat and happy god of abundance and good health
* {{ja-r|寿老人|^じゅろうじん}}: god of longevity
* {{ja-r|毘沙門天|^びしゃもんてん}}: god of warriors
* {{ja-r|弁才天|^べんざいてん}}, {{ja-r|弁財天|^べんざいてん}}: goddess of knowledge, art and beauty, especially music
* {{ja-r|大黒天|^だいこくてん}}: god of wealth, commerce and trade.
* {{l|ja|恵比須}}, {{l|ja|恵比寿}}, {{l|ja|夷}}, {{ja-r|戎|^えびす}}: god of fishers or merchants
